mapper.select: SELECT * FROM xzx_sys_privilege WHERE parent_id is null
SELECT p.* from xzx_sys_privilege p, xzx_sys_role r, xzx_sys_role_privilege rp WHERE rp.role_id = r.id AND rp.privilege_id = p.id AND r.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select p.* from xzx_sys_user u ,xzx_sys_user_role ur, xzx_sys_role r, xzx_sys_role_privilege rp ,xzx_sys_privilege p where u.id = ur.user_id and r.id = ur.role_id and rp.role_id = r.id and rp.privilege_id = p.id and u.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select distinct p.* from xzx_sys_privilege p inner join (select p.* from xzx_sys_user u ,xzx_sys_user_role ur, xzx_sys_role r, xzx_sys_role_privilege rp ,xzx_sys_privilege p where u.id = ur.user_id and r.id = ur.role_id and rp.role_id = r.id and rp.privilege_id = p.id and u.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and p.type = 'menu') new_p on p.id = new_p.parent_id
